devdoc.details: Work together with OriginalTokenVault deployed at remote chains.

params._nonce: A number to guarantee unique depositId. Can be timestamp in practice.
params._toAccount: The account to receive tokens on the remote chain
params._toChainId: If zero, withdraw from original vault; otherwise, the remote chain to mint tokens.

params._powers: The signing powers of the signers.
params._sigs: The list of signatures sorted by signing addresses in ascending order. A relay must be signed-off by +2/3 of the sigsVerifier's current signing power to be delivered.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: The bridge contract to mint and burn pegged tokens

burn(address,uint256,uint64,address,uint.notice: Burn pegged tokens to trigger a cross-chain withdrawal of the original tokens at a remote chain's OriginalTokenVault, or mint at another remote chain NOTE: This function DOES NOT SUPPORT fee-on-transfer / rebasing tokens.

mint(bytes,bytes[],address[],uint256[]).notice: Mint tokens triggered by deposit at a remote chain's OriginalTokenVault.
